page.title: 15RELIGION-R.C.ROSE GREEN
page.content: The Roman Catholic Church of St Anthony of Viaoreggio was converted from two bungalows 20 years ago.The priest in charge comes from the Servite Presbytery in Bognor Regis.The church serves Rose Green,Pagham,West Meads and North Bersted.The main service is The Mass each Sunday.The church has seating for 200 people. Organisations attached to the church cater for the elderly and do youth work,sick visiting and missionary work.The central features in the church are the Altar and Crucifix. Admission to full membership is through Baptism,then Confirmation coupled with First Communion.Main Festivals are Christmas,Easter,Whitsun and Saints days.
